title: massive jarvan bug
body:
anytime I e-q into veigar e as ajrvan jarvan would stop moving..

enven twice bliz grabs me as I was in teh center of it when I hit the walls I was instantly stopped

replies.body: Not a bug, they changed it so that if anyone is dashing out of the perimeter, they would get stunned.

More accurately the change made is that people dashing out/into Veigar wall have that ability cancelled upon impact and their character is stopped fully. Example: Jarvan EQ through Veigar E would stun him but he would go through it to his intended destination. The change we made stuns him like before but now stops Jarvan upon impact AND cancels his E-Q dash.

So this specifically isn't a bug, but I wouldn't be surprised if there was a bug with Veigar E somewhere though. Please keep bringing these things up if you feel that they're not working as intended x.^

*GASP* A RED REPLIEDDDD.

I actually thought it was meant to be taht way cuz i've seen quite a bit of those.....

If that wasn't meant to be, then Veig's E definitely has a bug in it ;P

hm I think I mislead you. You are correct that this is intended. Your description wasn't correct though. That behavior existed in the old paradigm as well, so I went ahead and clarified what the current paradigm looks like.

we're not just reds! x.^
veigar's cage also stops the knockback from lee sins kick too :(  cost me the penta i swear! ;)
